mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT c.club_number, c.club_name, c.profile_nickname AS club_Manager, cm.profile_nickname AS profile_nickname, FIND_CODE_NM(c.club_category) AS club_category, FIND_CODE_NM(c.club_type) AS club_type, FIND_CODE_NM(c.club_public) AS club_public, c.club_img, c.club_img_path, c.club_total
FROM club c
JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_number = cm.club_number
JOIN profile p ON cm.profile_nickname = p.profile_nickname
WHERE p.member_email = #{memberEmail}

SELECT prdt_id, FIND_CODE_NM(prdt_cate) AS prdt_cate, prdt_name, prdt_price, prdt_count, FIND_CODE_NM(prdt_soldout) AS prdt_soldout, prdt_thum, prdt_thum_path FROM prdt WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail}

SELECT c.board_number, c.club_number, c.club_board_writer, c.club_board_content, c.club_board_views, c.club_board_type, c.schedule_date, c.club_board_blind, p.profile_img, p.profile_img_path FROM CLUB_BOARD c JOIN PROFILE p ON(c.club_board_writer=p.profile_nickname) JOIN member m ON(p.member_email = m.member_email) WHERE m.member_email = #{memberEmail}

SELECT DISTINCT c.comment_number, c.board_number, c.club_comment_content, c.club_comment_date, c.club_comment_secret, c.club_comment_level, c.profile_nickname, p.profile_img, p.profile_img_path FROM CLUB_COMMENT c JOIN profile p ON(c.profile_nickname = p.profile_nickname) JOIN member m ON(p.member_email = p.member_email) WHERE p.member_email = #{memberEmail}

SELECT l.like_number, l.profile_nickname, l.board_number, c.club_number, c.club_board_content, c.club_board_wdate, c.club_board_views, c.club_board_type, c.schedule_date, c.club_board_blind, p.profile_img, p.profile_img_path FROM CLUB_BOARD_LIKE l JOIN CLUB_BOARD C ON(l.board_number = c.board_number) JOIN profile p ON(l.profile_nickname = p.profile_nickname) JOIN member m ON(p.member_email = m.member_email) WHERE p.member_email = #{memberEmail}
